com.percussion.extension
Interface IPSJexlExpression

All Superinterfaces:
IPSExtension
All Known Implementing Classes:
PSAssemblerUtils, PSCodecUtils, PSCondUtils, PSDateUtils, PSDbUtils, PSDocumentUtils, PSExtensionUtils, PSGuidUtils, PSI18nUtils, PSJexlUtilBase, PSKeywordUtils, PSLinkUtils, PSLocationUtils, PSManagedNavUtils, PSPaginateUtils, PSSessionUtils, PSStringUtils
public interface IPSJexlExpression
extends IPSExtension

Marker interface for jexl function bindings. Classes marked with this interface are usually registered with the extensions manager for use in the evaluation of jexl expressions. The classes are instantiated and bound to a set naming scheme. $rx.name is bound for each system context class and $user.name is bound for each user context class.

For example, $rx.codec is bound to the implementation class for codec utilities. This bound name can then be dereferenced to call methods, e.g. $rx.codec.base64Decoder(string) will do a base64 decode of the passed string.

The velocity tools are typically also bound, but they do not implement this marker interface.

Author:
dougrand
